doc.title: Bernau liegt am Meer
doc.plot: Judge Müller tries some unorthodox methods to rescue young people from the vicious circle of violence and hatred of ultra-rightist movements. He has the help of social workers like Rosemaria Kallas. Daniel, a 21-year-old from Bernau, a small city north of Berlin, has had a series of brush-ins with the law. Judge Müller and Frau Kallas, among others, help Daniel start to change.
